messages.subject: firetrucks
messages.msgSnippet: ... My dad had a really detailed toy fire truck when I was a kid. My brother in law was a volunteer fireman for years, and has two old retired firetrucks in
messages.messageBody:
> I really am curious what the top of the fire truck looks
> like because you usually just see the sides and the inside of the cab.
>

My dad had a really detailed toy fire truck when I was a kid.
My brother in law was a volunteer fireman for years, and has two old retired
firetrucks in his side yard.

google.com
image search
fire truck

That might do ya!

In South Carolina we went to a fire department museum that had some older
trucks all restored and gorgeous.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
